Ask HN: Tips, tools, for a “solopreneur” building side project on free time?
text:
Hello friends!

I would like to start a conversation here, looking for tips, links, good practices, knowledge sharing, good free tools (do you work like sprints? do you use asana/jira? etc), and whatever else you want to talk about, that helped you on this path of working out an idea _alone_.

Last question: How do you overcome the tireness of a full time job to work on your idea?

Thanks!

ps: feel free to post your ideas/microsaas links here, i'd really like to see what you guys are doing! :)

title: Show HN: How to build a bulk email service using serverless codehooks
text: This blog post shows how you can create a serverless background application for sending bulk HTML emails using the popular Mailgun SaaS and the new codehooks.io JavaScript/NoSQL backend service.

Ask HN: Has the Apple Silicon excessive disk read/write issue been fixed?
text:
This was a discussion when M1 macbooks were launched, and Apple supposedly addressed it in an OS update (macOS 11.4).

But I'm seeing really high read/write numbers. I'm aware that SSD lifespans are long and TBW spec is pretty generous. Still, compared to my linux machines, this seems extraordinarily high.

On my newish M1 MBA, with the latest updates, with barely any use, 98%+ sleep, I'm seeing about 3 to 5 GB reads per day and 2 to 4 GB writes per day.

Latest report from smartctl.

----------------------------------------------------

    === START OF SMART DATA SECTION ===
    SMART overall-health self-assessment test result: PASSED
    
    SMART/Health Information (NVMe Log 0x02)
    Critical Warning:                   0x00
    Temperature:                        27 Celsius
    Available Spare:                    100%
    Available Spare Threshold:          99%
    Percentage Used:                    0%
    Data Units Read:                    716,195 [366 GB]
    Data Units Written:                 616,232 [315 GB]
    Host Read Commands:                 9,108,273
    Host Write Commands:                6,947,397
    Controller Busy Time:               0
    Power Cycles:                       95
    Power On Hours:                     5
    Unsafe Shutdowns:                   11
    Media and Data Integrity Errors:    0
    Error Information Log Entries:      0
----------------------------------------------------

Is this normal?

Show HN: Share to HN – A PWA that gives you a sharing menu option for HN
text:
Hi HN!

I often use HN on my Android phone (no apps, just vanilla Chrome). I got tired of copy-pasting URLs and titles to submit links here so I made this little PWA to help with that. I know there's the bookmarklet [1] but it doesn't work on Chrome for Android, at least not for me. This works from any app.

[1] https://news.ycombinator.com/bookmarklet.html
